name: v1.0.1
body: * Fix compound relationships includes #116.

name: v1.0.0
body:
Initial 1.0.0 release.

Things have been stable in this gem for a while, so we're tagging a 1.0.0 release after the recent performance fixes and since many people are using this in production. 🚀  It's safe to upgrade straight from the last version to here with no changes.

name: v0.16.2
body:
Optimized certain repeated lookups.

**Please upgrade!** This includes a gigantic performance boost, 50-60% faster, especially with larger API responses.

name: v0.16.1
body: Fix bug with sparse fieldset attribute name handling.

name: v0.16.0
body: Support for sparse fieldsets.

name: v0.15.0
body: Added support for top-level `jsonapi` object. (#82)

name: v0.14.0
body: Added V1/V2 API namespace support.

name: v0.13.0
body: Add support for top level links.

name: v0.12.0
body: Exclude `id` in serialized payload when nil.

name: v0.11.0
body: Added ability to control links and data in relationships. #70

name: v0.10.0
body: Add support for `ActiveModel::Errors` parsing when passed to `serialize_errors`.

name: v0.9.0
body: Add initial `serialize_errors` support.

name: v0.8.0
body: Pass context through recursive relationships.

name: v0.7.0
body: Support for root error objects.

name: v0.6.5
body: Exclude attributes when empty.

name: v0.6.4
body: Fix regression of including links when empty.

name: v0.6.3
body: Fix support for underscore-formatted attribute names.

name: v0.6.2
body: Internal style updates and performance fixes.

name: v0.6.1
body: Spec compliance fix, include intermediate resources on compound documents.

name: v0.6.0
body: Support for polymorphic collections and inheriting serializer attributes.

name: v0.5.0
body: Support for explicit serializer discovery.

name: v0.4.0
body: Support for declaring multiple `attributes`.

name: v0.3.1
body: Improve performance of loading included relationships.

name: v0.3.0
body: Add top-level meta support.

name: v0.2.6
body: Add base_url support.

name: v0.2.5
body: Allow disabling ambiguous collection checks for Sequel support.

name: v0.2.4
body: Improve handling for nil relationship links.

name: v0.2.3
body: Support serializers with no attributes.

name: v0.2.2
body: Compliance fix for excluding empty relationship objects.

name: v0.2.1
body: Compliance fix for self links.

name: v0.2.0
body: Initial release with support for the final v1 JSON API spec.

name: v0.1.2
body: Updates to conform to spec updates, including new "relationships" key.
